text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump Mississippi was ranked 46 in public ed before #coronavirus. Now would be a great time to start funding schools/paying teachers. So glad @GOP finally realizes the importance of public education. Does this mean @BetsyDeVosED will be fired & replaced w/ someone competent?
